name: Chris Chicken Saga Part 1 - Underwater Chicken
name_original: Chris Chicken Saga Part 1 - Underwater Chicken
description:
Get ready, and experience a game just like any other you've ever played. You will assume the role of Steve, a down-on-his-luck dismembered walrus who is suddenly tasked with saving the precious Chris Chicken from the evil Pirate Dencker, who has accidentally dropped him into the sea.

You will use the arrow keys to swim down into the water, and left and right in order to evade hideous monsters trying to stop you. With breathtaking clip-art and absolutely paralleled gameplay, this is definitely a must-download.
